personas.name: Priya Sharma
personas.brief: Priya is a passionate environmental engineer who specializes in water treatment systems for industrial facilities. She grew up in a middle-class family in Pune and enjoys hiking in the Western Ghats on weekends. She's actively involved in local sustainability initiatives and volunteers with organizations focused on reducing plastic waste in urban areas.

personas.name: Marcus Chen
personas.brief: Marcus is a software engineer who works remotely for a tech startup while living in Portland's Hawthorne district. He enjoys craft beer brewing as a hobby and volunteers at local coding bootcamps on weekends. Having grown up in a military family, he values both innovation and stability in his approach to life and work.

personas.name: Marcus Chen
personas.brief: Marcus is a passionate software engineer who works for a sustainable tech startup in Portland's thriving tech scene. He enjoys rock climbing on weekends and is actively involved in local environmental advocacy groups. Born to Taiwanese immigrants, he speaks fluent Mandarin and regularly volunteers teaching coding to underserved youth in his community.

personas.name: Sofia Chen
personas.brief: Sofia is a passionate environmental engineer who specializes in sustainable water management systems for urban developments. She moved to Portland five years ago from California and spends her weekends hiking in the Cascade Mountains and volunteering at local community gardens. She's known among her colleagues for her innovative approaches to green infrastructure and her dedication to climate action.

personas.name: Marcus Chen
personas.brief: Marcus is a dedicated physical therapist who specializes in sports injury rehabilitation at a clinic in downtown Portland. He moved to Oregon five years ago for the outdoor lifestyle and spends his weekends hiking, rock climbing, and volunteering at youth sports programs. Known for his patient demeanor and evidence-based approach to treatment, he's building a strong reputation in the local athletic community.

personas.name: Marcus Chen
personas.brief: Marcus is a passionate environmental engineer who specializes in renewable energy systems for residential buildings. He enjoys hiking the Pacific Northwest trails on weekends and volunteers with local climate action groups. Marcus moved to Portland five years ago from San Francisco to work for a green technology startup.

personas.name: Marcus Chen
personas.brief: Marcus is a passionate software engineer who works remotely for a clean energy startup while living in Portland's vibrant Pearl District. He spends his weekends rock climbing in the Columbia River Gorge and volunteering at local coding bootcamps for underrepresented communities. Marcus is deeply committed to environmental causes and enjoys exploring Portland's renowned food truck scene.

personas.name: Maria Santos
personas.brief: Maria is a dedicated third-grade teacher who moved to Portland from California five years ago. She's passionate about environmental education and spends her weekends hiking in the Columbia River Gorge or volunteering at local community gardens. She lives in a small craftsman home in the Hawthorne district with her rescue dog Luna.

He spends his weekends hiking in the Columbia River Gorge and volunteers with local conservation groups. He lives in a small renovated craftsman house in Southeast Portland with his rescue dog Luna.

He's passionate about sustainable technology and spends weekends hiking in the Columbia River Gorge. personas.name: Sofia Andersson
personas.brief: Sofia is a passionate environmental engineer who specializes in sustainable water treatment systems for municipalities across Scandinavia. She grew up in a small coastal town and developed her love for environmental protection through childhood summers spent exploring tide pools and forests. In her free time, she enjoys rock climbing, playing the violin, and volunteering with local wildlife conservation groups.
